package.name: Gtk_Styled
package.summary: PHP-GTK pseudo-widgets that mimic GtkData based objects and allow the look and feel to be controlled by the programmer.
package.description: While it is possible to control some style elements of a GtkScrollBar, other elements cannot be controlled so easily. Items such as the images at the begining and end (usually arrows) and the scroll bar that is dragged to scroll the element cannot be changed. This leads to applications that either must conform to the windowing systems look and feel or appear incomplete. The goal of this family of PHP-GTK classes is to provide all the same functionality as a normal scroll bar but allow the user to have better control over the look and feel.
